verses.John 3:16: Ngoba uNkulunkulu wawuthanda umhlaba kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba ilowo lalowo okholwa kiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe lokuphila okungapheliyo.
verses.John 3:17: Ngoba uNkulunkulu kayithumelanga iNdodana emhlabeni ukuba iwulahle umhlaba, kodwa ukuba umhlaba usiliswe ngayo.
verses.John 3:18: Okholwa kiyo kalahlwa; kodwa ongakholwayo uselahliwe, ngoba engakholwanga ebizweni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa.
